camera_and_staging.viewpoint: 2D side-on with shallow depth (classic adventure staging).

pixel_discipline.line_discipline: Build forms with clean pixel clusters; avoid stray single pixels (orphans).
pixel_discipline.micro_noise_policy: No random single-pixel noise; use repeating cluster shapes for texture vocabulary.

scale_reference.notes: Heights are for standing sprites on the walkable strip.

proportions.style: Realistic anatomy and body proportions. The character body proportions must be realistically tall, approximately 7.5 heads high. Do not use chibi or SD proportions. **NO oversized heads. The head size must be anatomically correct relative to the torso and limbs for an adult human.**

outline_and_edges.rule: Use darker edges on high-contrast boundaries to separate the character from the background; avoid full black outline around every shape.
outline_and_edges.depth_separation: Foreground characters may use slightly stronger edge contrast than background characters.

lighting_and_shading.contrast_rule: HIGH CONTRAST between the 3 tones to create crisp definition of clothing folds and muscle shapes.
lighting_and_shading.highlights: small, pixel-perfect clusters; no glossy airbrush effects
lighting_and_shading.ambient_occlusion: minimal; use only at boot-ground contact and under collars or straps

face_readability.mouth: single cluster that changes between neutral and talk frames
face_readability.expressions: limited set; convey mood via posture and accessory cues

general_rules: Props must be readable at 4× scale with clear silhouettes.
Avoid readable text on character props; text belongs to environment signage.
Accessories should communicate role or function through shape, not labels.
prop_scale_guidance: Badges and small tools must be attached to a larger shape such as a lanyard or belt.

animation_direction.idle: Subtle breathing or weight shift; avoid constant motion.
animation_direction.talk: Small head or shoulder movement with mouth cluster change.
animation_direction.gesture: One clear gesture at a time.
animation_direction.interact: Short reach animation aligned to interaction point; avoid complex hand articulation.

do_not_do: No dense costume micro-textures that compete with interaction readability.
No exaggerated or comedic poses that break tone.
